metadata.title: CVE-2021-47373 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:irqchip/gic-v3-its: Fix potential VPE leak on error Inits_vpe_irq_domain_alloc, when its_vpe_init() returns an error, there is anoff-by-one in the number of VPEs to be freed. Fix it by simply passing thenumber of VPEs allocated, which is the index of the loop iterating over theVPEs. [maz: fixed commit message]

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
